strategy: Minervan Tank Legion armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Minervan Tank Legion Regiment

formations.name: Minervan Tank Company
formations.units: One Leman Russ Vanquisher with a Minervan Commander and a Commissar, nine Leman Russ
extraUnits: Replace any number of Leman Russ with Leman Russ Executioners: Free

formations.name: Super Heavy Tank Company
formations.units: Three Baneblades, Stormblades, Stormhammers and/or Shadowswords, one with a Minervan Commander and a Commissar

formations.name: Minervan Medusa Company
formations.units: Leman Russ Demolisher with a Minervan Commander and a Commissar, five Medusa.

formations.name: Minervan Mechanized Infantry Company
formations.units: Leman Russ Conqueror with a Minervan Commander and a Commissar, eight Infantry and four Chimeras
extraUnits: Add up to two Hellhounds: 25 points each

sections.name: Support Formations
sections.description: Up to two Support Formations for each Company.

formations.name: Artillery Battery
extraUnits: Replace three Basilisks with three Manticores: 25 points

formations.name: Super Heavy Tank Platoon
extraUnits: Replace one Baneblade, Stormhammer or Stormblade with a Shadowsword: 25 points

formations.name: Minervan Tank Squadron
formations.units: Four Leman Russ, Leman Russ Executioners, Leman Russ Punishers, Leman Russ Demolishers, Leman Russ Conquerors

sections.name: Imperial Navy Formations
sections.description: Up to a fourth of the points available may be spent on Imperial Navy Formations

formations.name: 0–1 Orbital Support
extraUnits: Replace with an Emperor Class Battleship for +50 points

upgrades.title: Minervan Tank Legion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

options.description: Replace one Minervan Commander in the army with a Minervan Supreme Commander
Replace the Minervan Supreme Commander's Commissar with a Lord Commissar
